사이오닉 특기

PSIONIC FEATS

사이오닉 특기 are available only to characters and creatures with the ability to manifest powers. (In other words, they either have a power point reserve or have 유사사이오닉 능력.)

Because 사이오닉 특기 are supernatural 능력—a departure from the general rule that 특기 do not grant supernatural 능력—they cannot be disrupted in 전투(as powers can be) and generally do not provoke 기회 공격 (except as noted in their 묘사). Supernatural 능력 are not subject to 파워 저항 and cannot be dispelled; however, they do not function in 범위 where 사이오닉 is suppressed, such as a 무의 사이오닉 장. Leaving such an 범위 immediately allows 사이오닉 특기 to be used.

Many 사이오닉 특기 can be used only when you are psionically focused; others require you to expend your 사이오닉 집중 to gain their benefit. Expending your 사이오닉 집중 does not require an action; it is part of another action (such as using a feat). When you expend your 사이오닉 집중, it applies only to the action for which you expended it.

사이오닉 아이템 제작 특기

PSIONIC ITEM CREATION FEATS

Manifesters can use their personal power to create lasting 사이오닉 아이템. Doing so, however, is draining. A manifester must put a little of himself or herself into every psionic item he or she creates.

A psionic item creation feat lets a manifester create a psionic item of a certain type. Regardless of the type of items they involve, the various 아이템 제작 특기 all have certain features in common.

XP Cost: Power and energy that the manifester would normally keep is expended when making a psionic item. 경험치 비용 of using a psionic item creation feat equals 1/25 the cost of the item in gold pieces. A character cannot spend so much XP on an item that he or she loses a 레벨. However, upon gaining enough XP to attain a new 레벨, he or she can immediately expend XP on creating an item rather than keeping the XP to advance a 레벨.

Raw Materials Cost: Creating a psionic item requires costly 구성요소, most of which are consumed in the process. The cost of these materials equals 1/2 the cost of the item.

Using a psionic item creation feat also requires access to a laboratory or psionic workshop, special tools, and other 장비. A character generally has access to what he or she needs unless unusual circumstances apply (such as if he’s traveling far from home).

Time: The time to create a psionic item depends on the feat and the cost of the item. The minimum time is one day.

Item Cost: 도르제 제작, 파워스톤 새기기, and 문신 새기기 create items that directly reproduce the effects of powers, and 근력 of these items depends on their 구현자 레벨—that is, a power from such an item has 근력 it would have if manifested by a manifester of that 레벨. Often, that is the minimum 구현자 레벨 necessary to manifest the power. (Randomly discovered items usually follow this rule.) However, when making such an item, the item’s 근력 can be set higher than the minimum. Any time a character creates an item using a power augmented by spending additional 파워 포인트, the character’s effective 구현자 레벨 for 목적 of calculating the item’s cost increases by 1 for each 1 additional power point spent. (Augmentation is a feature of many powers that allows the power to be amplified in various ways if additional 파워 포인트 are spent.) All other 레벨-dependent parameters of the power forged into the item are set according to the effective 구현자 레벨.

The price of 사이오닉 아이템(and thus the XP cost and the cost of the raw materials) depends on 레벨 of the power and a character’s 구현자 레벨. The character’s 구현자 레벨 must be high enough that the item creator can manifest the power at the chosen 레벨. To find the final price in each case, multiply the character’s 구현자 레벨 by the power 레벨, then multiply the result by a constant, as shown below.

파워스톤: Base price = power 레벨 x 구현자 레벨 x 25 gp

사이오닉 문신: Base price = power 레벨 x 구현자 레벨 x 50 gp

도르제: Base price = power 레벨 x 구현자 레벨 x 750 gp

Extra Costs: Any dorje, power stone, or psionic tattoo that stores a power with an XP cost also carries a commensurate cost.

For 사이오닉 문신 and 파워스톤, the creator must pay the XP cost when creating the item. For a dorje, the creator must pay fifty times the XP cost.

Some 사이오닉 아이템 similarly incur extra costs in XP, as noted in their 묘사.

메타사이오닉 특기

METAPSIONIC FEATS

As a manifester’s 지식 of 사이오닉 grows, he can learn to manifest powers in ways slightly different from how the powers were originally designed or learned. Of course, manifesting a power while using a metapsionic feat is more expensive than manifesting the power normally.

구현 시간: Powers manifested using 메타사이오닉 특기 take the same time as manifesting the powers normally unless the feat 묘사 specifically says otherwise.

Manifestation Cost: To use a metapsionic feat, a psionic character must both expend his 사이오닉 집중(see 집중 skill 묘사) and pay an increased power point cost as given in the feat 묘사.

Limits on Use: As with all powers, you cannot spend more 파워 포인트 on a power than your 구현자 레벨. 메타사이오닉 특기 merely let you manifest powers in different ways; they do not let you violate this rule.

Effects of 메타사이오닉 특기 on a Power: In all ways, a metapsionic power operates at its original power 레벨, even though it costs additional 파워 포인트. The modifications to a power made by a metapsionic feat have only their noted effect on the power. A manifester can’t use a metapsionic feat to alter a power being cast from a power stone, dorje, or other device.

Manifesting a power modified by 빠른 파워 feat does not provoke 기회 공격.

Some 메타사이오닉 특기 apply only to certain powers, as described in each specific feat entry.

사이오닉 아이템 and Metapsionic Powers: With the right psionic item creation feat, you can store a metapsionic power in a power stone, psionic tattoo, or dorje. 레벨 limits for 사이오닉 문신 apply to the power’s higher metapsionic 레벨.

A character doesn’t need the appropriate metapsionic feat to activate an item in which a metapsionic power is stored, but does need the metapsionic feat to create such an item.

특기 설명

FEAT DESCRIPTIONS

These 특기 설명 follow the standard format.

성향 공격 [사이오닉]

ALIGNED ATTACK [PSIONIC]

Your melee or ranged 공격 overcomes your opponent’s 성향-based 피해 축소 and deals additional 피해.

Prerequisite: 기본 공격 보너스 +6.

Benefit: When you take this feat, choose either chaos, good, evil or law. (Your choice must match one of your 성향 구성요소. Once you’ve made this 성향 choice, it cannot be changed.

To use this feat, you must expend your 사이오닉 집중. When you make a successful melee or ranged 공격, you deal an extra 1d6 points of 피해, and your 공격 is treated as either a good, evil, chaotic, or lawful 공격 (depending on your original choice) for 목적 of overcoming 피해 축소.

You must decide whether or not to use this feat prior to making an 공격. If your 공격 misses, you still expend your 사이오닉 집중.

대사이오닉 마법 [일반]

ANTIPSIONIC MAGIC [GENERAL]

Your 주문 are more potent when used against psionic characters and creatures.

Prerequisite: 주문학 5 ranks.

Benefit: You get a get a +2 보너스 on 시전자 레벨 checks made to overcome a psionic creature’s 파워 저항.

This 보너스 stacks with 보너스 conferred by 주문 관통 and 상급 주문 관통. Moreover, whenever a psionic creature attempts to dispel a spell you cast, it makes its 구현자 레벨 check against a DC of 13 + its 구현자 레벨.

The benefits of this feat apply only to 파워 저항.

보너스 does not apply to 주문 저항. This is an exception to 사이오닉–magic transparency rule.

Special: You cannot take or use this feat if you have the ability to use powers (if you have a power point reserve or 유사사이오닉 능력).

자율능력 [일반]

AUTONOMOUS [GENERAL]

You have a knack for psionic self-sufficiency.

Benefit: You get a +2 보너스 on all 자기최면 checks and 지식(사이오닉) checks.

바이오 연료 [사이오닉]

BODY FUEL [PSIONIC]

You can expand your power point total at the expense of your health.

Benefit: You can recover 2 파워 포인트 by taking 1 point of ability burn 피해 to each of your three 능력 점수: 근력, 민첩, and 건강.

You can recover additional 파워 포인트 for a proportional cost to 근력, 민첩, and 건강. These recovered points are added to your power point reserve as if you had gained them by resting overnight.

Special: Only living creatures can use this feat. You can take advantage of this feat only while in your own body.

구조물 가속화 [사이오닉]

BOOST CONSTRUCT [PSIONIC]

Your 영적 구조물 have more 능력.

Benefit: When you create an 영적 구조물, you can give it one additional special ability from any menu that the construct currently has an ability from.

파고드는 권능 [메타사이오닉]

BURROWING POWER [METAPSIONIC]

Your powers sometimes 바이패스 barriers.

Benefit: To use this feat, you must expend your 사이오닉 집중. You can attempt to manifest your powers against targets that are sheltered behind a wall or force effect. Your power briefly skips through 영적 세계 to 바이패스 the barrier.

근력 and thickness of the barrier determine your chance of success. To successfully 바이패스 the barrier with your power, you make a 사이크래프트 check against a DC equal to 10 + the hardness of the barrier + 1 per foot of thickness (minimum 1). Assign a hardness of 20 to barriers without a hardness rating, such as force effects (or a 심령의 벽). Force 벽 or 벽 of ectoplasm are assumed to have less than 1 foot of thickness unless noted otherwise.

If a power requires line of sight (which includes most powers that affect a target or targets instead of an 범위), you cannot manifest it as a 파고드는 권능 unless you can somehow see the target, such as with 투시 감각. Using this feat increases the power point cost of the power by 2. The power’s total cost cannot exceed your 구현자 레벨.

사슬의 권능 [메타사이오닉]

CHAIN POWER [METAPSIONIC]

You can manifest powers that arc to hit other targets in addition to the primary target.

Benefit: To use this feat, you must expend your 사이오닉 집중. You can chain any power that affects a single target and that deals either acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic 피해. After the primary target is struck, the power can arc to a number of secondary targets equal to your 구현자 레벨(maximum twenty). The secondary arcs each strike one target and deal half as much 피해 as the primary one did (round down).

Each target gets to make a 내성 굴림, if one is allowed by the power. You choose secondary targets as you like, but they must all be within 30 feet of the primary target, and no target can be struck more than once. You can choose to affect fewer secondary targets than the maximum (to avoid allies in 범위, for example).

Using this feat increases the power point cost of the power by 6. The power’s total cost cannot exceed your 구현자 레벨.

혼돈의 정신 [일반]

CHAOTIC MIND [GENERAL]

The turbulence of your thoughts prevents others from gaining insight into your actions.

Prerequisite: Chaotic 성향, Cha 15.

Benefit: Creatures and characters who have an insight 보너스 on their 명중 굴림, an insight 보너스 to their 방어도, or an insight 보너스 on 스킬 판정 or 능력 판정 do not gain those 보너스 against you.

The benefit of this feat applies only to insight 보너스 gained from 사이오닉 파워 and 유사사이오닉 능력. This is an exception to 사이오닉–magic transparency rule.

Special: You cannot take or use this feat if you have the ability to use powers (if you have a power point reserve or 유사사이오닉 능력).

망토의 춤 [일반]

CLOAK DANCE [GENERAL]

You are skilled at using optical tricks to make yourself seem to be where you are not.

전제조건: 숨기 10 ranks, 공연(dance) 2 ranks.

Benefit: You can take a 이동 action to obscure your exact position. Until your next turn, you have 은폐. Alternatively, you can take a full-round action to entirely obscure your exact position. Until your next action, you have total 은폐.

정신 폐쇄 [일반]

CLOSED MIND [GENERAL]

Your mind is better able to resist 사이오닉 than normal.

Benefit: You get a +2 보너스 on all 내성 굴림 to resist powers.

The benefit of this feat applies only to 사이오닉 파워 and 유사사이오닉 능력. This is an exception to the 사이오닉–magic transparency rule.

Special: You cannot take or use this feat if you have the ability to use powers (if you have a power point reserve or 유사사이오닉 능력).

전투 구현 [사이오닉]

COMBAT MANIFESTATION [PSIONIC]

You are 주문숙련자 at 파워 구현 in 전투.

Benefit: You get a +4 보너스 on 집중 checks made to manifest a power or use a psi-like ability while on the defensive or while you are grappling or pinned.

인식의 결정 제작 [아이템 제작]

CRAFT COGNIZANCE CRYSTAL [ITEM CREATION]

You can create psionic 인식의 결정 that store 파워 포인트.

Prerequisite: 구현자 레벨 3rd.

Benefit: You can create a cognizance crystal. Doing so takes one day for each 1,000 gp in its base price. The base price of a cognizance crystal is equal to the highest-레벨 power it could manifest using all its stored 파워 포인트, squared, multiplied by 1,000 gp. To create a cognizance crystal, you must spend 1/25 of its base price in XP and use up raw materials costing one-half its base price.

도르제 제작 [아이템 제작]

CRAFT DORJE [ITEM CREATION]

You can create slender crystal 마법막대 called 도르제 than manifest powers when 돌격 are expended.

Prerequisite: 구현자 레벨 5th.

Benefit: You can create a dorje of any psionic power you know (barring exceptions, such as 파워 부여, as noted in a power’s 묘사). Crafting a dorje takes one day for each 1,000 gp in its base price. The base price of a dorje is its 구현자 레벨 x the power 레벨 x 750 gp. To 제작 a dorje, you must spend 1/25 of this base price in XP and use up raw materials costing one-half of this base price.

A newly created dorje has 50 돌격.

Any dorje that stores a power with an XP cost also carries a commensurate cost. In addition to the XP cost derived from the base price, you must pay fifty times the XP cost.

사이크라운 제작 [아이템 제작]

CRAFT PSICROWN [ITEM CREATION]

You can create 사이크라운, which have multiple psionic effects.

Prerequisite: 구현자 레벨 12th.

Benefit: You can create any psicrown whose 전제조건 you meet. Crafting a psicrown takes one day for each 1,000 gp in its base price. To 제작 a psicrown, you must spend 1/25 of its base price in XP and use up raw materials costing one-half of its base price. Some 사이크라운 incur extra costs in XP as noted in their 묘사. These costs are in addition to those derived from the psicrown’s base price.

사이오닉 무기와 갑옷 제작 [아이템 제작]

CRAFT PSIONIC ARMS AND ARMOR [ITEM CREATION]

You can create 사이오닉 무기, 갑옷, and 방패.

Prerequisite: 구현자 레벨 5th.

Benefit: You can create any 사이오닉 무기, 갑옷, or 방패 whose 전제조건 you meet. Enhancing a weapon, suit of 갑옷, or 방패 takes one day for each 1,000 gp in the price of its psionic features. To enhance a weapon, you must spend 1/25 of its features’ total price in XP and use up raw materials costing one-half of this total price.

The weapon, 갑옷, or 방패 to be enhanced must be a masterwork item that you provide. Its cost is not included in the above cost.

You can also mend a broken 사이오닉 무기, suit of 갑옷, or 방패 if it is one that you could make. Doing so costs half the XP, half the raw materials, and half the time it would take to enhance that item in the first place.

사이오닉 구조물 제작 [아이템 제작]

CRAFT PSIONIC CONSTRUCT [ITEM CREATION]

You can create 골렘 and other psionic automatons that obey your orders.

전제조건: 사이오닉 무기와 갑옷 제작, 우주적 아이템 제작.

Benefit: You can create any psionic construct whose 전제조건 you meet. Creating a construct takes one day for each 1,000 gp in its base price. To create a construct, you must spend 1/25 of the construct’s base price in XP and use up raw materials costing one-half of this price. A newly created construct has average 히트 포인트 for its 히트 다이스.

우주적 아이템 제작 [아이템 제작]

CRAFT UNIVERSAL ITEM [ITEM CREATION]

You can create universal 사이오닉 아이템.

Prerequisite: 구현자 레벨 3rd.

Benefit: You can create any universal psionic item whose 전제조건 you meet. Crafting a universal psionic item takes one day for each 1,000 gp in its base price. To 제작 a universal psionic item, you must spend 1/25 of the item’s base price in XP and use up raw materials costing one-half of this price.

You can also mend a broken universal item if it is one that you could make. Doing so costs half the XP, half the raw materials, and half the time it would take to 제작 that item in the first place.

Some 우주적 아이템 incur extra costs in XP, as noted in their 묘사. These costs are in addition to those derived from the item’s base price. You must pay such a cost to create an item or to mend a broken one.

치명적인 정밀함 [일반]

DEADLY PRECISION [GENERAL]

You empty your mind of all distracting emotion, becoming an instrument of 치명적인 정밀함.

Prerequisite: Dex 15, 기본 공격 보너스 +5.

Benefit: You have deadly accuracy with your sneak 공격. You can reroll any result of 1 on your sneak 공격’s extra 피해 주사위. You must keep the result of the reroll, even if it is another 1.

거대 충돌 [사이오닉]

DEEP IMPACT [PSIONIC]

You can strike your foe with a melee weapon as if making a touch 공격.

Prerequisite: Str 13, 사이오닉 무기, 기본 공격 보너스 +5.

Benefit: To use this feat, you must expend your 사이오닉 집중. You can resolve your 공격 with a melee weapon as a touch 공격. You must decide whether or not to use this feat prior to making an 공격. If your 공격 misses, you still expend your 사이오닉 집중.

파워 지연 [메타사이오닉]

DELAY POWER [METAPSIONIC]

You can manifest powers that go off up to 5 rounds later.

Benefit: To use this feat, you must expend your 사이오닉 집중. You can manifest a power as a delayed power. A delayed power doesn’t activate immediately. When you manifest the power, you choose one of three 트리거 mechanisms: (1) The power activates when you take a standard action to activate it; (2) It activates when a creature enters 범위 that the power will affect (only powers that affect 범위 can use this 트리거 condition); or (3) It activates on your turn after 5 rounds pass. If you choose one of the first two 트리거 and 상태이상 are not met within 5 rounds, the power activates automatically on the fifth round.

Only 범위 and personal powers can be delayed.

Any decisions you would make about the delayed power, including 명중 굴림, designating targets, or determining or shaping an 범위, are decided when the power is manifested. Any effects resolved by those affected by the power, including 내성 굴림, are decided when 지연 period ends.

A delayed power can be dispelled normally during 지연, and can be detected normally in 범위 or on the target by the use of powers that can detect psionic effects.

Using this feat increases the power point cost of the power by 2. The power’s total cost cannot exceed your 구현자 레벨.

파워 강화 [메타사이오닉]

EMPOWER POWER [METAPSIONIC]

You can manifest powers to 상급 effect.

Benefit: To use this feat, you must expend your 사이오닉 집중.

You can empower a power. All variable, numeric effects of an empowered power are increased by one-half. An empowered power deals half again as much 피해 as normal, cures half again as many 히트 포인트, affects half again as many targets, and so forth, as appropriate. Augmented powers can also be empowered (multiply 1-1/2 times 피해 total of the augmented power). 내성 굴림 and 대항 판정(such as the one you make when you manifest 사이오닉 무효화) are not affected, nor are powers without random variables.

Using this feat increases the power point cost of the power by 2. The power’s total cost cannot exceed your 구현자 레벨.

파워 거리 연장 [메타사이오닉]

ENLARGE POWER [METAPSIONIC]

You can manifest powers farther than normal.

Benefit: To use this feat, you must expend your 사이오닉 집중. You can alter a power with a 거리 of close, medium, or long to increase its 거리 by 100%. An enlarged power with a 거리 of close has a 거리 of 50 feet + 5 feet per 레벨, a medium-거리 power has a 거리 of 200 feet + 20 feet per 레벨, and a long-거리 power has a 거리 of 800 feet + 80 feet per 레벨.

Powers whose 거리 are not defined by distance, as well as powers whose 거리 are not close, medium, or long, are

not affected.

Using this feat does not increase the power point cost of the power.

지식의 확장 [사이오닉]

EXPANDED KNOWLEDGE [PSIONIC]

You learn another power.

전제조건: 구현자 레벨 3rd.

Benefit: Add to your powers known one additional power of any 레벨 up to one 레벨 lower than the highest-레벨 power you can manifest. You can choose any power, including powers from another 분야’s list or even from another class’s list.

Special: You can gain this feat multiple times. Each time, you learn one new power at any 레벨 up to one less than the highest-레벨 power you can manifest.

파워 시간 연장 [메타사이오닉]

EXTEND POWER [METAPSIONIC]

You can manifest powers that last longer than normal.

Benefit: To use this feat, you must expend your 사이오닉 집중.

You can manifest an extended power. An extended power lasts twice as long as normal. A power with a 지속시간 of 집중, instantaneous, or permanent is not affected by this feat.

Using this feat increases the power point cost of the power by 2. The power’s total cost cannot exceed your 구현자 레벨.

타락한 사격 [사이오닉]

FELL SHOT [PSIONIC]

You can strike your foe with a ranged weapon as if making a touch 공격.

You must be aware of 공격 and not flat-footed. Attempting to return a shot is a free action.

문신 새기기 [아이템 제작]

SCRIBE TATTOO [ITEM CREATION]

You can create 사이오닉 문신, which store powers within their designs.

Prerequisite: 구현자 레벨 3rd.

Benefit: You can create a psionic tattoo of any power of 3rd 레벨 or lower that you know and that targets one or more creatures. Scribing a psionic tattoo takes one day. When you create a psionic tattoo, you set the 구현자 레벨. 구현자 레벨 must be sufficient to manifest the power in question and no higher than your own 레벨. The base price of a psionic tattoo is its power 레벨 x its 구현자 레벨 x 50 gp. To scribe a tattoo, you must spend 1/25 of this base price in XP and use up raw materials (special inks, masterwork needles, and so on) costing one-half of this base price.

When you create a psionic tattoo, you make any choices that you would normally make when manifesting the power.

When its wearer physically activates the tattoo, the wearer is the target of the power.

Any psionic tattoo that stores a power with an XP cost also carries a commensurate cost. In addition to the costs derived from the base price, you must pay the XP when creating the tattoo.
